name: Cold Dark Zomburn
description:
Are you afraid of the cold dark?

Are you afraid of zombies?

Burn them down... 

Movement - WASD

Aiming - Mousemovement

Gunfire - Left Mousebutton

Flamethrower - Right Mousebutton

HealthRefill - Q

MagmaRefill - E

- NOTE: WebGL version does not reflect the full experience - PC version recommended -

Entry for Ukraine Winter GameJam2023 & prototype for future use.

All Assets are from Unity Asset Store (free license) or made by myself. Created in Unity and written in C#. Also used GIMP as painting tool.

Have Fun and leave a comment.

UPDATE: 25.02.2023 19:10 - Upload V02 with bugfixes
